column4: Could someone point me to how to install lamp in ubuntu 9.10? or an up to date link?
Could someone point me to how to install lamp in ubuntu 9.10? or an up to date link?
ehehe  lamp?     well, you already have the 'L', install Apache2 and that gives you the 'A' and 'P', install mysql and that gives the 'M'
well i don't know how to install AMP...yes i have L
ehehe  lamp?     well, you already have the 'L', install Apache2 and that gives you the 'A' and 'P', install mysql and that gives the 'M'    <----   sudo apt-get install apache2 mysql-server-5.0
and php???
Apache webserver already comes with PHP as module, don't need to add anything extra, and also has mysql modules for accessing the server
thus it gives you the 'a' and 'p'
thank you...long live the king! :)
<voice type="elvis">  thank you, thank you very much </voice>
:))) ahahhahahahha you made my day!

sorry, no familiar with such yet... .maybe you want to elaborate more on how and when it exactly happens, for others to be able to help, 'does not work' isn't really explainful, and there's a lack of clarivoyancy in the channel ^_^
I have configured my pppoe with sudo pppoeconf...sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't...if i type plog in the terminal something strange is there...maybe this can help you guys...
serial link appears to be disconnected/connection terminated.modem hangup/ (so it gives me the connection time...anything works great and then when my internet goes down and i plog i see this.)
sorry, no familiar with such yet :(
ehh it's ok. thanks anyway! :)
Hey typos the bash script you gave me doesn't start conky everytime i login
hehe, can't say... I don't use conky :|
well that's ok i will still look for a way to auto start conky every time. Did you had a todo list program on your ubuntu machine? I cross on a problem with it...as you can see above.
there are several spots where to start something upon boot.. if that helps
